long_description: Our RFID Money Belt is the perfect travel companion to deter pickpockets and help you combat ID theft. It blocks access to personal data stored on embedded micro chips. Special liner helps block unauthorized scanning of RFID (radio frequency identification) chips inside passports and credit and debit cards. 2 zippered compartments accommodate passport, cash, cards and airline tickets. Water-resistant, ripstop nylon construction stands up to wear and tear. Adjustable waist strap.
short_description: Our RFID Money Belt is the perfect travel companion to deter pickpockets and help you combat ID theft. It blocks access to personal data stored on embedded micro chips.
